required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of the Efficacy and Safety of the Combination of Two FDA Approved Oral Medications, Nebivolol and Valsartan for Treatment of Stage 1 or 2 Hypertension
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-Controlled, 8-Week Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Nebivolol and Valsartan Given as a Fixed Dose Combination in Patients With Stage 1 or 2 Essential Hypertension

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of fixed-dose combination of nebivolol and valsartan compared to monotherapy and placebo in patients with stage 1 and stage 2 hypertension.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Sitting Diastolic Blood Pressure (DBP)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Sitting Systolic Blood Pressure (SBP)

arm_group.arm_group_label: Nebivolol and Valsartan Fixed Dose Combination 1
arm_group.description: Fixed Dose Combination Nebivolol 5 mg and Valsartan 80 mg

arm_group.arm_group_label: Nebivolol and Valsartan Fixed Dose Combination 2
arm_group.description: Fixed Dose Combination Nebivolol 5 mg and Valsartan 160 mg

arm_group.arm_group_label: Nebivolol and Valsartan Fixed Dose Combination 3
arm_group.description: Fixed Dose Combination Nebivolol 10 mg and Valsartan 160 mg

intervention.description: Fixed Dose Combination Nebivolol 5 mg and Valsartan 80 mg, oral administration, then dose doubled at Week 11 to Fixed Dose Combination Nebivolol 10 mg and Valsartan 160 mg, oral administration
intervention.arm_group_label: Nebivolol and Valsartan Fixed Dose Combination 1

intervention.description: Fixed Dose Combination Nebivolol 5 mg and Valsartan 160 mg, oral administration then dose doubled at Week 11 to Fixed Dose Combination Nebivolol 10 mg and Valsartan 320 mg, oral administration
intervention.arm_group_label: Nebivolol and Valsartan Fixed Dose Combination 2

intervention.description: Fixed Dose Combination Nebivolol 10 mg and Valsartan 160 mg, oral administration then dose doubled at Week 11 to Fixed Dose Combination Nebivolol 20 mg and Valsartan 320 mg, oral administration
intervention.arm_group_label: Nebivolol and Valsartan Fixed Dose Combination 3

intervention.description: Nebivolol Monotherapy 5 mg, oral administration, then dose doubled to at Week 11 to Nebivolol Monotherapy 10 mg, oral administration
Nebivolol Monotherapy 20 mg, oral administration, then dose doubled to at Week 11 to Nebivolol Monotherapy 40mg, oral administration
Valsartan Monotherapy 80 mg, oral administration, then dose doubled to at Week 11 to Valsartan Monotherapy, 160 mg, oral administration
Valsartan Monotherapy 160 mg, oral administration, then dose doubled to at Week 11 to Valsartan Monotherapy, 320 mg, oral administration

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Male or female outpatients of age 18 years or above
- Patients diagnosed with stage 1 or stage 2 essential hypertension
- Normal physical examination findings, electrocardiogram (ECG) results and chest x-ray; or abnormal findings judged by the Investigator to be not clinically significant
Exclusion Criteria:
- Secondary hypertension or severe hypertension
- Clinically significant cardiovascular disease or heart failure
- Clinical significant respiratory disease that would prohibit the use of a beta blocker
- A medical contraindication to discontinuing a current antihypertensive therapy
- History of Type 1 diabetes mellitus
- History of Severe Mental Illness except mild depression

overall_official.last_name: David B Bharucha, MD, PhD, FACC
